text:
Nasty! American Chinese food with 6 poor choices. The rest, hotdogs, fries, potatoes, spagetti, macaroni and cheese etc 
The toilets were absolutely filthy. Urine all over the floor and black mold growing in the urinals!
How does the health dept let them get away with this.
grossest food experience in a long time,  the rice stank of cigarette ashes.
Don't ever order from here it's really shit food they should really consider getting a way better cook. No matter what you take it won't be good .
